title: Series A Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement

obligations.description: Must redeem shares if no qualified IPO by redemption trigger date

special_terms: Weighted average anti-dilution protection in down rounds
Investors participate pro-rata in remaining proceeds during liquidation

conditions.Information Rights: Quarterly unaudited and annual audited financial statements
conditions.Pro-Rata Rights: Right to maintain ownership percentage in future financings
conditions.Drag-Along Rights: Must participate in company sale if approved by majority holders

termination_conditions: Redemption rights if no IPO by January 1, 2030
